<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>active</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.glideapp.workflow" name="Workflow Runtime Engine" version="1.0.0" provider_name="ServiceNow" invalidate_properties="true" state="published" help="Workflow" licensable="true">
<description>The runtime workflow engine.</description>
<requires> <import plugin="com.glide.diagrammer"/> <import plugin="com.glide.vars"/> <import plugin="com.glide.schedules"/> <import plugin="com.glide.relative_duration"/> <import plugin="com.glide.web_service_application"/> <import plugin="com.glide.service_api"/> <import plugin="com.snc.datastructure"/> <import plugin="com.glideapp.live_feed"/> </requires>
<extension point="com.glide.script.engine" name="Workflow" class="com.glideapp.workflow.engine.WorkflowEngine" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="WorkflowStageRenderer" class="com.glideapp.workflow.stages.WorkflowStageRenderer" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="WorkflowPaths" class="com.glideapp.workflow.model.WorkflowPaths" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="RendererAPI" class="com.glideapp.workflow.stages.RendererAPI" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="WorkflowScriptAPI" class="com.glideapp.workflow.WorkflowScriptAPI" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ElementVersionAPI" class="com.glideapp.workflow.element.ElementVersionAPI" /> <extension point="com.glide.ui.jelly" name="workflow_schedule" class="com.glide.ui.jelly.tags.form.WorkflowScheduleTag2" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="DataStructureAPI" class="com.glideapp.workflow.element.DataStructureAPI" /> </plugin> ]]></definition> <description>The runtime workflow engine.</description> <has_demo_data>false</has_demo_data> <help>http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=Workflow</help> <id>com.glideapp.workflow</id> <licensable>true</licensable> <name>Workflow Runtime Engine</name> <path>plugin://com.glideapp.workflow/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.glide.diagrammer,com.glide.vars,com.glide.schedules,com.glide.relative_duration,com.glide.web_service_application,com.glide.service_api,com.snc.datastructure,com.glideapp.live_feed</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.glideapp.workflow</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>true</trackable> <type/> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
